attributes.action: make Jut & Runny Kings of the Universe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically Tone, me old muker. Me and Runny want to be kings, innit. So could you please have a word with the UN, EU and NATO to get this approved. We need an island to live on, and its gotta be proper hot with loads of honey servants. Also, we would like a spaceship. Its very hard to be Kings of the Universe without a spaceship. Something like an X-Wing would do…they're well neat. Thanks

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
